text: Attila Feri (born 24 September 1968 in Târgu Mureș) is a retired weightlifter who competed for Romania in 1992 Summer Olympics and later for Hungary and he won a Bronze medal in the 70 kg in the 1996 Summer Olympics in Atlanta while competing for Hungary. ==Major results== {|class = "wikitable" style="text- align:center;" !
